response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe has the potential to significantly impact and benefit your business. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its value to be well above $1,200,000. To ensure we both reach a mutually beneficial agreement, I am offering this exceptional product to you at an exclusive price of $1,500,000. This offer includes comprehensive support and customization options tailored to your specific needs. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's any way I can assist you in making a decision.", "product_price": 1500000}
